title: Go Next Level Agency
description: Developed a fully custom WordPress website for Go Next Level Agency, a leading digital marketing firm. Using Tailwind CSS and GSAP for dynamic design and animations, the site offers a seamless, multilingual experience with minimal plugin usage. This project highlights my expertise in creating high-performance, bespoke websites that elevate brand presence and user engagement.

title: BEXS Detachering
description: Developed a custom WordPress website for BEXS Detachering, a leading recruitment and staffing firm. The site features a fully responsive design, minimal plugin usage for optimal performance, and seamless integration of core services. This project showcases my expertise in creating bespoke, high-impact websites that align with a client’s unique brand and business needs.

title: Oak Food
description: We recently delivered the Oak Food eCommerce website, a custom WordPress solution designed to highlight the brand's culinary offerings. Our team handled the complete UI/UX design, ensuring a clean and user-friendly interface. Additionally, we implemented basic on-page and technical SEO to enhance visibility and search engine performance, providing a seamless shopping experience across all devices.

title: World Bridge VPN
description: Introducing you to our latest project—World Bridge VPN. We’ve meticulously crafted an iOS mobile app UI in Figma, paired with a sleek and functional website. Our design was inspired by an in-depth analysis of popular VPNs in the market, and we’re confident it stands out as the best among them.
